Attributes:

  * `prevLabel` {`string`} - 

  * `nextLabel` {`string`} - 

  * `itemData` {`any[]`} - 

  * `selection` {`string`} - 

Properties:

  * `first` - gets id for first figure

  * `prev` - gets id for previous figure

  * `last` - gets id for last figure

  * `next` - gets id for next figure

  * `noButtons` {`boolean`} - 

  * `noPrevNext` {`boolean`} - 

  * `prevLabel` {`string`} - 

  * `nextLabel` {`string`} - 

  * `itemData` {`any[]`} - 

  * `selection` {`string`} - 

  * `selectedIndex` {`number`} - index of selected item

  * `__observer` - mutation observer for tabs

  * `__allowNull` {`boolean`} - allows no item to be selected

  * `__query` {`string`} - overrides query selector for slotted children

  * `__selected` {`string`} - overrides attribute to apply to selected item

  * `__selectEvent` {`string`} - overrides name of event that selects item

tags.name: a11y-collapse
tags.description:
`a11y-collapse`
an accessible expand collapse

### Styling

`<a11y-collapse>` provides the following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-collapse-margin` | margin around a11y-collapse | 15px 0
`--a11y-collapse-border` | border around a11y-collapse | 1px solid
`--a11y-collapse-horizontal-padding` | horizontal padding inside a11y-collapse | 16px
`--a11y-collapse-horizontal-padding-left` | left padding inside a11y-collapse | `--a11y-collapse-horizontal-padding`
`--a11y-collapse-horizontal-padding-right` | right padding inside a11y-collapse | `--a11y-collapse-horizontal-padding`
`--a11y-collapse-vertical-padding` | vertical padding inside a11y-collapse | 16px
`--a11y-collapse-horizontal-padding-top` | top padding inside a11y-collapse | `--a11y-collapse-vertical-padding`
`--a11y-collapse-horizontal-padding-bottom` | bottom padding inside a11y-collapse | --a11y-collapse-vertical-padding
`--a11y-collapse-border-between` | border between a11y-collapse heading and content | --a11y-collapse-border
`--a11y-collapse-heading-font-weight` | font-weight for a11y-collapse heading | bold
`--a11y-collapse-heading-color` | text color for a11y-collapse heading | unset
`--a11y-collapse-heading-background-color` | background-color for a11y-collapse heading | unset
`--a11y-collapse-overflow-y` | override default overflow behavior | hidden
`--a11y-collapse-max-height` | override maximum height of collapse section | 200000000000vh, so that aanimation effect works

Events:

  * `a11y-collapse-attached` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when constructed, so that parent radio group can listen for it.

  * `a11y-collapse-detached` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when detatched, so that parent radio group will no longer listen for it.

  * `toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when toggled.

  * `a11y-collapse-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when toggled. @deprecated Use `toggle` instead

  * `expand` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when expanded.

  * `collapse` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when collapsed.

  * `a11y-collapse-click` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when clicked.

Attributes:

  * `icon-expanded` {`string`} - icon when expanded

  * `label-expanded` {`string`} - optional label for the button when expanded

  * `tooltip-expanded` {`string`} - optional tooltip for the button when expanded

  * `heading-button` {`boolean`} - Heading is the expand button.

  * `accordion` {`boolean`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - disbled

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - hidden

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - icon when expanded

  * `heading` {`string`} - heading / title for the button

  * `icon` {`string`} - icon for the button

  * `label` {`string`} - label for the button

  * `tooltip` {`string`} - tooltip for the button

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `iconExpanded` {`string`} - icon when expanded

  * `labelExpanded` {`string`} - optional label for the button when expanded

  * `tooltipExpanded` {`string`} - optional tooltip for the button when expanded

  * `headingButton` {`boolean`} - Heading is the expand button.

  * `accordion` {`boolean`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - disbled

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - hidden

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - icon when expanded

  * `heading` {`string`} - heading / title for the button

  * `icon` {`string`} - icon for the button

  * `label` {`string`} - label for the button

  * `tooltip` {`string`} - tooltip for the button

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -

tags.name: a11y-collapse-group
tags.description:
`a11y-collapse-group`
a group of `a11y-collapse` elements

### Styling

`<a11y-collapse-group>` provides the following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-collapse-group-margin` | margin around the a11y-collapse-group | 15px 0

Attributes:

  * `global-options` - an array of globalProperties to override every a11y-collapse item
For example, {"icon": "arrow-drop-down"} would set every item's icon to "arrow-drop-down"

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - Acts like a radio button. (Items can only be expanded one at a time.)

  * `__items` {`any[]`} - is radio button

Properties:

  * `items` {`any[]`} -

For example, {"icon": "arrow-drop-down"} would set every item's icon to "arrow-drop-down"

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - Acts like a radio button. (Items can only be expanded one at a time.)

  * `__items` {`any[]`} - is radio button

tags.name: a11y-details
tags.description:
`a11y-details`
accessible progressive disclosure with detail and summary
### Styling
#### Summary Button
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--a11y-details-summary-fontSize | font-size | 0.8em
--a11y-details-summary-color | text color | #000
--a11y-details-summary-backgroundColor | background-color | #fff
--a11y-details-summary-borderColor | border-color | #000
--a11y-details-summary-borderWidth | border-width | 1px
--a11y-details-summary-borderStyle | border-style | solid
--a11y-details-summary-borderRadius | border-radius | 3px
--a11y-details-summary-padding | padding | 0.5em

#### Summary Button (:focus state)
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--a11y-details-summary-focus-color | text color | #000
--a11y-details-summary-focus-backgroundColor | background-color | #fff
--a11y-details-summary-focus-borderColor | border-color | #000
--a11y-details-summary-focus-borderWidth | border-width | 1px
--a11y-details-summary-focus-borderStyle | border-style | dotted
--a11y-details-summary-focus-borderRadius | border-radius | 3px

#### Details
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--a11y-details-fontSize | font-size  | 0.8em
--a11y-details-color | text color | #000
--a11y-details-backgroundColor | background-color | rgba(255,255,255,1)
--a11y-details-borderColor | border-color | #000
--a11y-details-borderWidth | border-width | 1px
--a11y-details-borderStyle | border-style | solid
--a11y-details-borderRadius | border-radius | 3px
--a11y-details-padding | padding | 0.5em
--a11y-details-left | left position | 0
--a11y-details-right | right position | 0
--a11y-details-maxHeight | max-height | 400px

Attributes:

  * `close-text` {`string`} - optional text for when summary button is open,
eg. "Hide", "Less" or "Close"

  * `open-text` {`string`} - optional text for when summary button is closed,
eg. "Show", "More" or "Open"

Properties:

  * `details` {`HTMLDetailsElement | null | undefined`} - gets the details element in shadowRoot

  * `summaryClasses` {`string`} - gets classe sfor summary to hide summary slot if open/closed text is provided

  * `observer` - mutation observer for a11y-details

  * `detailsObserver` - mutation observer for <details/> in unnamed slot

  * `closeText` {`string`} - optional text for when summary button is open,
eg. "Hide", "Less" or "Close"

  * `openText` {`string`} - optional text for when summary button is closed,
eg. "Show", "More" or "Open"

  * `tag` {`string`} -

tags.name: a11y-gif-player
tags.description:
`a11y-gif-player`
plays gifs in an accessible way by having the user click to play their animation
### Styling

`<a11y-gif-player>` provides the following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-gif-player-border` | border around player/button | none
`--a11y-gif-player-border-radius` | border-radius for player/button | 0
`--a11y-gif-player-focus-border` | border-radius for player/button when hovered or focused | none
`--a11y-gif-player-cursor` | cursor for player/button when hovered or focused | pointer
`--a11y-gif-player-outline` | outline for player/button when hovered or focused | 
`--a11y-gif-player-disabled-cursor` | cursor for player/button when disabled | not-allowed
`--a11y-gif-player-arrow-size` | arrow icon size | 30%
`--a11y-gif-player-arrow-opacity` | default arrow icon opacity | 0.5
`--a11y-gif-player-button-focus-opacity` | arrow icon opacity when hovered or focused | 0.7
`--a11y-gif-player-button-color` | arrow icon color | #000000
`--a11y-gif-player-arrow-border-color` | arrow icon border color | #ffffff
`--a11y-gif-player-arrow-border-width` | arrow icon border width | 15px
`--a11y-gif-player-button-text-color` | arrow icon text color | #ffffff
`--a11y-gif-player-button-bg` | button background color when no static image | #cccccc

Attributes:

  * `alt` {`string`} - Alt text of gif

  * `described-by` {`string`} - other id's to add to aria-describedby

  * `longdesc` {`string`} - longer image description for accesibility

  * `src` {`string`} - Source of animated gif

  * `src-without-animation` {`string`} - Source of static version of image

  * `__gifLoaded` {`boolean`} - if the gif source is loaded to avoid jarring on load

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether button is disabled

  * `__playing` {`boolean`} - whether GIF is playing

  * `t` - 

  * `element-visible` {`boolean`} - 

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly

tags.name: a11y-media-player
tags.description:
`a11y-media-player`
an accessible video player

### Styling
`<a11y-media-player>` provides the following basic custom properties
for styling:

#### Basic Styling

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-color` | default text color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-11`
`--a11y-media-bg-color` | default background color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-border-color` | default border color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-3`
`--a11y-media-hover-color` | text color when hovering | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-hover-bg-color` | background color when hovering | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-accent-color` | accent color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-9`
`--a11y-media-faded-accent-color` | accent color when faded | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-8`
`--a11y-media-disabled-color` | color for disabled items | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-5`
`--a11y-media-transcript-color` | default text color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-7`
`--a11y-media-transcript-bg-color` | default background color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-accent-color` | default accent color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-8`
`--a11y-media-transcript-faded-accent-color` | accent color of transcript, faded | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-10`
`--a11y-media-transcript-cue-color` | text color of transcript cue | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-cue-bg-color` | background color of transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-color` | text color of active transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-bg-color` | background color of active transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-color` | text color of focused transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-bg-color` | background color of focused transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-color` | text color of matched term in transcript search  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-bg-color` | background color of matched term in transcript search | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-10`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-border-color` | border color of matched term in transcript search | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-12`

#### Controls
Custom property | Description | Default 
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-scrollbar-width` | default width of scrollbars | `5px`
`--a11y-media-controls-font-family` | font-family of controls

#### Buttons
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-button-color` | button text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--a11y-media-button-bg-color` | button background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-button-hover-color` | button text color when hovering | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--a11y-media-button-hover-bg-color` | button background color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-button-disabled-color` | button text color when disabled | `--a11y-media-disabled-color`
`--a11y-media-button-toggle-color` | button text color when toggled | `--a11y-media-faded-accent-color`

#### Sliders
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--simple-range-input-active-color` | slider color when active | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-secondary-color` | slider color for buffering | `--a11y-media-faded-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-color` | slider pin color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-start-color` | slider pin color in start position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-end-color` | slider pin color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-color` | slider knob color | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-start-color` | slider knob color in start position | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-end-color` | slider knob color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-border-color` | slider knob border color | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-start-border-color` | slider knob border color in start position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-end-border-color` | slider knob border color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`

#### Settings Menu
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-color` | settings menu text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-bg-color` | settings menu background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-hover-color` | settings menu text color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-hover-bg-color` | settings menu background color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-bg-color`

#### Link Sharing Toast
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--simple-toast-color` | toast text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--simple-toast-background-color` | toast background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`

Events:

  * `mute-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when closed caption is toggled

  * `transcript-downloaded` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript is downloaded

  * `transcript-printed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript is printed

  * `play` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media plays

  * `a11y-player-playing` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - DEPRECATED: Fires when media plays

  * `pause` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media pauses

  * `stop` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media stops

  * `restart` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media retarts

  * `backward` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media moves backward

  * `forward` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media moves forward

  * `seek` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media seeks

  * `playback-rate-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when video playback rate changes

  * `volume-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when video volume changes

  * `cc-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when closed caption is toggled

  * `fullscreen-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when fullscreen is toggled

  * `loop-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when looping is toggled

  * `play-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when play/pause is toggled

  * `muted-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when mute is toggled

  * `settings-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when video's settings menu is toggled

  * `player-sticky` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when video's sticky behavior is toggled

  * `transcript-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript toggles

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; attribute: string; relativeToParent: boolean; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - Fires player needs the size of parent container to add responsive styling

  * `a11y-player` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when a new player is ready for a11y-media-state-manager

Attributes:

  * `crossorigin` {`string`} - crossorigin attribute for <video> and <audio> tags

  * `height` {`string`} - The height of the media player.

  * `source` {`string`} - 

  * `thumbnail-src` {`string`} - Source of optional thumbnail image
Highly recommended for Safari.

  * `__preloadedDuration` {`number`} - temporarily duration in seconds until fully loaded

  * `currentTime` {`number`} - current time for video playback

  * `__playerReady` {`boolean`} - 

  * `audio-only` {`boolean`} - Is this an audio file?

  * `autoplay` {`boolean`} - autoplay is an option,
but generally not recommended for a11y

  * `allow-concurrent` {`boolean`} - Allow this media to play concurrently with other a11y-media-players?
Default is to pause this a11y-media-player when other a11y-media-player starts playing.

  * `cc` {`boolean`} - show closed captions

  * `dark-transcript` {`boolean`} - Use dark theme on transcript? Default is false, even when player is dark.

  * `disable-fullscreen` {`boolean`} - disable fullscreen option

  * `disable-interactive` {`boolean`} - disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

  * `disable-print-button` {`boolean`} - disable transcript print button

  * `disable-search` {`boolean`} - disable transcript search feature

  * `disable-scroll` {`boolean`} - disable autoscrolling as transcript plays

  * `disable-seek` {`boolean`} - disables seeking

  * `hide-elapsed-time` {`boolean`} - Hide elapsed time?

tags.name: a11y-media-transcript-cue
tags.description:
`a11y-media-transcript-cue`
a single cue in a11y-media-transcriptas static text or as an button that controls media.

Custom styles:
```--a11y-media-transcript-bg-color: background color of the transcript, default is #ffffff
--a11y-media-transcript-text-color: color of the transcript text, default is #000000```
   
Custom styles for focused cue:
```--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-text: color of the focused cue text, default is --a11y-media-transcript-text-color
--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-bg: background color of the focused cue, default is --a11y-media-transcript-bg-color
--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-weight: font-weight of the focused cue, default is bold```
   
Custom styles for active cue:
```--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-text: color of the active cue text, default is --a11y-media-transcript-text-color
--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-bg: background color of the active cue, default is #ccfffd
--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-weight: font-weight of the active cue, default is normal```

Events:

  * `active-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; oldValue: any; value: true; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `active` {`boolean`} - whether to hide the timestamps

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - whether to hide the timestamps

  * `hide-timestamps` {`boolean`} - whether to hide the timestamps

  * `start` {`string`} - cue start time

  * `end` {`string`} - cue end time

Properties:

  * `active` {`boolean`} - whether to hide the timestamps

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - whether to hide the timestamps

  * `hideTimestamps` {`boolean`} - whether to hide the timestamps

  * `start` {`string`} - cue start time

`a11y-media-youtube`
uses YouTubeAPI to create and control an embedded YouTube video.

Events:

  * `mediastatechange` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `loadedmetadata` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `timeupdate` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `id` {`string`} - a11y-media-youtube unique id

  * `t` {`number`} - youTube's unique identifier for the video

  * `video-id` {`string`} - youTube's unique identifier for the video

  * `autoplay` {`boolean`} - video loops back to start

  * `height` {`string`} - height of the embedded video

  * `loop` {`boolean`} - video loops back to start

  * `playback-rate` {`number`} - video playback rate

  * `preload` {`string`} - preload settings

  * `muted` {`boolean`} - video muted

  * `volume` {`number`} - volume between 0 and 100

  * `width` {`string`} - width of the embedded video

  * `__yt` - youtube object

tags.name: a11y-media-player
tags.description:
`a11y-media-player`
an accessible video player

### Styling
`<a11y-media-player>` provides the following basic custom properties
for styling:

#### Basic Styling

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-color` | default text color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-11`
`--a11y-media-bg-color` | default background color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-border-color` | default border color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-3`
`--a11y-media-hover-color` | text color when hovering | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-hover-bg-color` | background color when hovering | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-accent-color` | accent color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-9`
`--a11y-media-faded-accent-color` | accent color when faded | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-8`
`--a11y-media-disabled-color` | color for disabled items | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-5`
`--a11y-media-transcript-color` | default text color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-7`
`--a11y-media-transcript-bg-color` | default background color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-accent-color` | default accent color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-8`
`--a11y-media-transcript-faded-accent-color` | accent color of transcript, faded | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-10`
`--a11y-media-transcript-cue-color` | text color of transcript cue | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-cue-bg-color` | background color of transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-color` | text color of active transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-bg-color` | background color of active transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-color` | text color of focused transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-bg-color` | background color of focused transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-color` | text color of matched term in transcript search  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-bg-color` | background color of matched term in transcript search | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-10`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-border-color` | border color of matched term in transcript search | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-12`

#### Controls
Custom property | Description | Default 
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-scrollbar-width` | default width of scrollbars | `5px`
`--a11y-media-controls-font-family` | font-family of controls

#### Buttons
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-button-color` | button text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--a11y-media-button-bg-color` | button background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-button-hover-color` | button text color when hovering | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--a11y-media-button-hover-bg-color` | button background color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-button-disabled-color` | button text color when disabled | `--a11y-media-disabled-color`
`--a11y-media-button-toggle-color` | button text color when toggled | `--a11y-media-faded-accent-color`

#### Sliders
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--simple-range-input-active-color` | slider color when active | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-secondary-color` | slider color for buffering | `--a11y-media-faded-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-color` | slider pin color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-start-color` | slider pin color in start position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-end-color` | slider pin color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-color` | slider knob color | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-start-color` | slider knob color in start position | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-end-color` | slider knob color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-border-color` | slider knob border color | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-start-border-color` | slider knob border color in start position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-end-border-color` | slider knob border color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`

#### Settings Menu
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-color` | settings menu text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-bg-color` | settings menu background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-hover-color` | settings menu text color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-hover-bg-color` | settings menu background color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-bg-color`

#### Link Sharing Toast
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--simple-toast-color` | toast text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--simple-toast-background-color` | toast background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`

Events:

  * `mute-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when closed caption is toggled

  * `transcript-downloaded` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript is downloaded

  * `transcript-printed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript is printed

  * `play` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media plays

  * `a11y-player-playing` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - DEPRECATED: Fires when media plays

  * `pause` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media pauses

  * `stop` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media stops

  * `restart` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media retarts

  * `backward` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media moves backward

  * `forward` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media moves forward

  * `seek` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when media seeks

  * `playback-rate-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when video playback rate changes

  * `volume-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when video volume changes

  * `cc-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when closed caption is toggled

  * `fullscreen-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when fullscreen is toggled

  * `loop-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when looping is toggled

  * `play-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when play/pause is toggled

  * `muted-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when mute is toggled

  * `settings-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when video's settings menu is toggled

  * `player-sticky` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when video's sticky behavior is toggled

  * `transcript-toggle` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript toggles

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; attribute: string; relativeToParent: boolean; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - Fires player needs the size of parent container to add responsive styling

  * `a11y-player` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when a new player is ready for a11y-media-state-manager

Attributes:

  * `crossorigin` {`string`} - crossorigin attribute for <video> and <audio> tags

  * `height` {`string`} - The height of the media player.

  * `source` {`string`} - 

  * `thumbnail-src` {`string`} - Source of optional thumbnail image
Highly recommended for Safari.

  * `__preloadedDuration` {`number`} - temporarily duration in seconds until fully loaded

  * `currentTime` {`number`} - current time for video playback

  * `__playerReady` {`boolean`} - 

  * `audio-only` {`boolean`} - Is this an audio file?

  * `autoplay` {`boolean`} - autoplay is an option,
but generally not recommended for a11y

  * `allow-concurrent` {`boolean`} - Allow this media to play concurrently with other a11y-media-players?
Default is to pause this a11y-media-player when other a11y-media-player starts playing.

  * `cc` {`boolean`} - show closed captions

  * `dark-transcript` {`boolean`} - Use dark theme on transcript? Default is false, even when player is dark.

  * `disable-fullscreen` {`boolean`} - disable fullscreen option

  * `disable-interactive` {`boolean`} - disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

  * `disable-print-button` {`boolean`} - disable transcript print button

  * `disable-search` {`boolean`} - disable transcript search feature

  * `disable-scroll` {`boolean`} - disable autoscrolling as transcript plays

  * `disable-seek` {`boolean`} - disables seeking

  * `hide-elapsed-time` {`boolean`} - Hide elapsed time?

  * `hide-timestamps` {`boolean`} - show cue's start and end time

  * `hide-transcript` {`boolean`} - initially hide the transcript?

  * `id` {`string`} - initially hide the transcript?

  * `lang` {`string`} - Language

  * `learning-mode` {`boolean`} - Learning mode

  * `linkable` {`boolean`} - has link button

  * `localization` - custom localization settings

  * `loop` {`boolean`} - Loop the video?

  * `media-title` {`string`} - optional title of media (shows when printed)

  * `media-lang` {`string`} - Dash.js manifest source?
/

the language of the media (if different from user interface language)

  * `preload` {`string`} - Preload `none`, `metadata`, or `auto`.

  * `playback-rate` {`number`} - Playback rate where `1` is normal speed, `0.`5 is half-speed, and `2` is double speed

  * `search` - the search tool for the transcript

  * `sticky-corner` {`string`} - When playing but scrolled off screen, to which corner does it "stick":
top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right, or none?
Default is "top-right". "None" disables stickiness.

  * `tracks` {`any[]`} - DEPRECATED: array of tracks.

tags.name: a11y-menu-button
tags.description:
a11y-menu-button
A toggle button for an property in editable-table interface (editable-table.html).

### Styling

`<a11y-menu-button>` provides custom properties for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
--a11y-menu-button-vertical-padding | vertical padding for menu button | 2px
--a11y-menu-button-horizontal-padding | horizontal padding for menu button | 5px
--a11y-menu-button-text-align | text alignment for menu button | center
--a11y-menu-button-bg-color | default background color | white
--a11y-menu-button-color | default text color | black
--a11y-menu-button-box-shadow | menu button box-shadow | unset
--a11y-menu-button-border-radius | menu button border-radius | 0
--a11y-menu-button-border | default border | 1px solid #ddd
--a11y-menu-button-border-left | overrides default left-border | unset
--a11y-menu-button-border-top | overrides default top-border | unset
--a11y-menu-button-border-right | overrides default right-border | unset
--a11y-menu-button-border-bottom | overrides default bottom-border | unset
--a11y-menu-button-focus-bg-color | background color for menu button when focused | --a11y-menu-button-bg-color
--a11y-menu-button-focus-color | text color for menu button when focused | --a11y-menu-button-color
--a11y-menu-button-focus-border | border for menu button when focused | --a11y-menu-button-border
--a11y-menu-button-focus-border-left | menu button left-border when focused | --a11y-menu-button-border-left
--a11y-menu-button-focus-border-top | menu button top-border when focused | --a11y-menu-button-border-top
--a11y-menu-button-focus-border-right | menu button right-border when focused | --a11y-menu-button-border-right
--a11y-menu-button-focus-border-bottom | menu button bottom-border when focused | --a11y-menu-button-border-bottom
--a11y-menu-button-focus-box-shadow | menu button box-shadow when focused | --a11y-menu-button-box-shadow
--a11y-menu-button-list-width | width of menu list | unset
--a11y-menu-button-list-height | height of menu list | unset
--a11y-menu-button-list-left | left position of menu list | 0
--a11y-menu-button-list-top | top position of menu list | unset
--a11y-menu-button-list-bottom | bottom position of menu list | unset
--a11y-menu-button-list-right | right position of menu list | unset
--a11y-menu-button-list-bg-color | overrides default background color for list box | --a11y-menu-button-bg-color
--a11y-menu-button-border | overrides default border for list box | --a11y-menu-button-list-border
--a11y-menu-button-list-box-shadow | overrides default box shadow for list box | unset

Events:

  * `close` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu is closed

  * `open` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu is opened

  * `item-click` {`CustomEvent<Event>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `position-align` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `keep-open-on-click` {`boolean`} - overrides default behavior of closing
menu after an item is clicked

  * `no-open-on-hover` {`boolean`} - disables menu i=opening on hover

Properties:

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `menuTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for dropdown menu

  * `buttonTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for button

  * `listItemTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for slotted list items

  * `keyCode` {`{ TAB: number; RETURN: number; ESC: number; SPACE: number; PAGEUP: number; PAGEDOWN: number; END: number; HOME: number; LEFT: number; UP: number; RIGHT: number; DOWN: number; }`} - key code translations as object

  * `firstItem` - gets first menu item

  * `previousItem` - gets previous menu item

  * `nextItem` - gets next menu item

  * `lastItem` - gets last menu item

  * `firstChars` {`any[]`} - gets list of menu item first characters

  * `itemListeners` {`{ click: (event: Event | undefined) => void; focus: (event: Event | undefined) => void; blur: (event: Event | undefined) => void; mouseover: (event: Event | undefined) => void; mouseout: (event: Event | undefined) => void; keydown: (event: Event | undefined) => void; }`} - menuitem event listeners and their handlers

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `positionAlign` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `keepOpenOnClick` {`boolean`} - overrides default behavior of closing
menu after an item is clicked

  * `noOpenOnHover` {`boolean`} - disables menu i=opening on hover

tags.name: a11y-tabs
tags.description:
`a11y-tabs`
an accessible and responsive tabbed interface

### Styling

`<a11y-tabs>` provides the following custom properties
for styling:

#### General
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-tabs-font-family` | font-family | unset
`--a11y-tabs-font-size` | font-size | unset
`--a11y-tabs-border-color` | border | #ddd
`--a11y-tabs-color` | text color | #222
`--a11y-tabs-focus-color` | text color when focused | #000
`--a11y-tabs-margin` |  | 16px 0
`--a11y-tabs-width` | total width | 100%
`--a11y-tabs-height` | total height | unset
`--a11y-tabs-overflow` | default overflow | auto
`--a11y-tabs-overflow-x` | overflow of x-axis | `--a11y-tabs-overflow`
`--a11y-tabs-overflow-y` | overflow of y-axis | `--a11y-tabs-overflow`
`--a11y-tabs-border-radius` | default border radius | 2px
`--a11y-tabs-horizontal-border-radius` | border-radius when horizontal | `--a11y-tabs-border-radius`
`--a11y-tabs-vertical-border-radius` | border-radius when veritcal | `--a11y-tabs-border-radius`
`--a11y-tabs-text-decoration` | default text decoration for tab button | none
`--a11y-tabs-focus-text-decoration` | default text on focus or hover | underline

#### Tab Panel
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-tabs-tab-font-family` | font-family | `--a11y-tabs-font-family`
`--a11y-tabs-tab-font-size` | font-size | `--a11y-tabs-font-size`

tags.name: absolute-position-behavior
tags.description:
`absolute-position-behavior`
abstracts absolute positioning behavior to be resusable in other elements

Attributes:

  * `allow-overlap` {`boolean`} - Element has absolututely positioned children, such as menus
and tooltips that are allowed to overlap the target

  * `position-align` {`string`} - Aligns at the start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `justify` {`boolean`} - 

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - Element is positioned from connected to disconnected?
Otherwise setPosition and unsetPosition must be called manually.

  * `fit-to-visible-bounds` {`boolean`} - If true, no parts of the tooltip will ever be shown offscreen.

  * `for` {`string`} - The id of the element that the tooltip is anchored to. This element
must be a sibling of the tooltip. If this property is not set,
then the tooltip will be centered to the parent node containing it.

  * `offset` {`number`} - The spacing between the top of the tooltip and the element it is
anchored to.

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions the tooltip to the top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `target` - The actual target element

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - Stays on screen while target is on screen

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - If true, no parts of the tooltip will ever be shown offscreen.

  * `__positions` - The element's style

Properties:

  * `allowOverlap` {`boolean`} - Element has absolututely positioned children, such as menus
and tooltips that are allowed to overlap the target

  * `positionAlign` {`string`} - Aligns at the start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `justify` {`boolean`} - 

  * `_ticking` {`boolean`} - 

  * `scrollTarget` - 

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - Element is positioned from connected to disconnected?
Otherwise setPosition and unsetPosition must be called manually.

  * `fitToVisibleBounds` {`boolean`} - If true, no parts of the tooltip will ever be shown offscreen.

  * `for` {`string`} - The id of the element that the tooltip is anchored to. This element
must be a sibling of the tooltip. If this property is not set,
then the tooltip will be centered to the parent node containing it.

  * `offset` {`number`} - The spacing between the top of the tooltip and the element it is
anchored to.

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions the tooltip to the top, right, bottom, left of its content.

tags.name: accent-card
tags.description:
`accent-card`

Attributes:

  * `icon-size` {`string`} - 

  * `image-width` {`string`} - 

  * `accent-background` {`boolean`} - Apply accent color to card background

  * `accent-heading` {`boolean`} - Apply accent color to heading

  * `flat` {`boolean`} - Display card as flat (no box shadow);

  * `horizontal` {`boolean`} - Display card as a horizontal layout? Default is vertical.

  * `image-align` {`string`} - "Optional": Horizontal alignment of image, so that:
- "left" will align left edge of image.
- "right" will align right edge of image.
- "center" will align center of image
- A null will allow temporary support to deprecated CSS variables

  * `image-src` {`string`} - "Optional": source for an image on card

  * `image-valign` {`string`} - "Optional": vertical alignment of image, so that:
- "top" will align top of edge of image.
- "bottom" will align bottom edge of image.
- "center" will align middle of image.
- A null will allow temporary support to deprecated CSS variables

  * `no-border` {`boolean`} - Removes think accent border

  * `ready` {`boolean`} - 

  * `link` {`string`} - 

  * `element-visible` {`boolean`} - 

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `imageAlign` {`string`} - "Optional": Horizontal alignment of image, so that:
- "left" will align left edge of image.
- "right" will align right edge of image.
- "center" will align center of image
- A null will allow temporary support to deprecated CSS variables

  * `imageSrc` {`string`} - "Optional": source for an image on card

- "top" will align top of edge of image.
- "bottom" will align bottom edge of image.
- "center" will align middle of image.
- A null will allow temporary support to deprecated CSS variables

tags.name: app-editor-hax
tags.description:
`app-editor-hax`
stand alone editor intended for use in a larger application
as the editor. It is like cms-hax in that it's prepackaged
the way HAX will be integrated but the connotation is that there
is no edit state and that it is always editing effectively.

Events:

  * `app-editor-hax-save` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `app-editor-hax-import` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `appStoreConnection` - Establish the app store connection to pull in our JSON

Properties:

  * `appStoreConnection` - Establish the app store connection to pull in our JSON

tags.name: audio-player
tags.description:
`audio-player`
`simple audio web component to match video`

Attributes:

  * `height` {`string`} - Height of media player.

  * `id` {`string`} - Unique id

  * `media-title` {`string`} - Simple caption for video

  * `track` {`string`} - Url for a single subtitle track

  * `thumbnail-src` {`string`} - Source of optional thumbnail image

  * `width` {`string`} - Width of media player for non-a11y-media.

  * `sourceData` - Source properties and slotted sources

  * `sourceType` {`string`} - 

  * `crossorigin` {`string`} - Cross origin flag for transcripts to load

  * `darkTranscript` {`boolean`} - Use dark theme on transcript? Default is false, even when player is dark.

  * `disableInteractive` {`boolean`} - disable interactive mode that makes transcript clickable

  * `hide-timestamps` {`boolean`} - show cue's start and end time

  * `hide-transcript` {`boolean`} - Hide transcript by default

  * `hide-youtube-link` {`boolean`} - Open on YouTube button

  * `lang` {`string`} - Language of media

  * `playing` {`boolean`} - Data reactivity for play status from a11y-media-player

  * `allow-background-play` {`boolean`} - Option to allow playing while not active tab

  * `learning-mode` {`boolean`} - Learning mode

  * `linkable` {`boolean`} - Include a share link?

  * `sources` {`any[]`} - Array of multiple video sources

  * `sticky-corner` {`string`} - When playing but scrolled off screen, to which corner does it "stick":
`top-left`, `top-right`, `bottom-left`, `bottom-right`, or `none`?
Default is `top-right`. `None` disables stickiness.

  * `tracks` {`any[]`} - Array of text tracks, eg. `[{ "src": "path/to/track.vtt", "label": "English", "srclang": "en", "kind": "subtitles", }]`

  * `source` {`string`} - Single sources of video

  * `element-visible` {`boolean`} - 

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

  * `t` - 

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - Optional accent color for controls,
using these colors:
`red`, `pink`, `purple`, `deep-purple`, `indigo`, `blue`,
`light-blue`, `cyan`, `teal`, `green`, `light-green`, `lime`,
`yellow`, `amber`, orange, deep-orange, and brown.
Default is null.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - Enables darker player.

Properties:

  * `height` {`string`} - Height of media player.

  * `id` {`string`} - Unique id

  * `mediaTitle` {`string`} - Simple caption for video

  * `track` {`string`} - Url for a single subtitle track

  * `thumbnailSrc` {`string`} - Source of optional thumbnail image

  * `width` {`string`} - Width of media player for non-a11y-media.

  * `html5` - gets the HTML5 `audio` or `video` children

  * `iframed` {`boolean`} - Computes whether uses iframe

  * `isA11yMedia` {`boolean`} - Determines if compatible with `a11y-media-player`

  * `observer` - mutation observer for tabs

  * `sandboxed` {`boolean`} - Compute sandboxed status

  * `sourceProperties` {`any[]`} - Gets cleaned source list from source and sources properties

  * `trackProperties` {`any[]`} - Gets cleaned track list from track and tracks properties

  * `sourceData` - Source properties and slotted sources

  * `audioOnly` {`boolean`} - 

  * `standAlone` {`boolean`} - 

  * `trackData` {`any[]`} - Gets cleaned track list

  * `youtubeId` {`string`} - Gets Youtube ID from source string

  * `playerId` {`string`} - gets an id for a11y-media-player

  * `currentTime` - mapping down into the shadowRoot element bc these are common things to want to know

  * `windowControllers` - 

  * `sourceType` {`string`} - 

  * `crossorigin` {`string`} - Cross origin flag for transcripts to load

  * `darkTranscript` {`boolean`} - Use dark theme on transcript? Default is false, even when player is dark.

  * `disableInteractive` {`boolean`} - disable interactive mode that makes transcript clickable

  * `hideTimestamps` {`boolean`} - show cue's start and end time

  * `hideTranscript` {`boolean`} - Hide transcript by default

  * `hideYoutubeLink` {`boolean`} - Open on YouTube button

  * `lang` {`string`} - Language of media

  * `playing` {`boolean`} - Data reactivity for play status from a11y-media-player

  * `__setVisChange` {`boolean`} - 

  * `allowBackgroundPlay` {`boolean`} - Option to allow playing while not active tab

  * `learningMode` {`boolean`} - Learning mode

  * `linkable` {`boolean`} - Include a share link?

  * `sources` {`any[]`} - Array of multiple video sources

  * `stickyCorner` {`string`} - When playing but scrolled off screen, to which corner does it "stick":
`top-left`, `top-right`, `bottom-left`, `bottom-right`, or `none`?
Default is `top-right`. `None` disables stickiness.

  * `tracks` {`any[]`} - Array of text tracks, eg. `[{ "src": "path/to/track.vtt", "label": "English", "srclang": "en", "kind": "subtitles", }]`

  * `source` {`string`} - Single sources of video

  * `elementVisible` {`boolean`} - 

  * `IOThresholds` {`number[]`} -

using these colors:
`red`, `pink`, `purple`, `deep-purple`, `indigo`, `blue`,
`light-blue`, `cyan`, `teal`, `green`, `light-green`, `lime`,
`yellow`, `amber`, orange, deep-orange, and brown.
Default is null.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - Enables darker player.

tags.name: chartist-render
tags.description:
Events: * `chartist-render-ready` {`CustomEvent`} - Fired once once chart is ready. * `chart-data-changed` {`CustomEvent`} - Fires when chartData changes * `data-source-changed` {`CustomEvent`} - Fires when data-source changes * `data-changed` {`CustomEvent`} - Fires when data changes * `chartist-render-data` {`CustomEvent`} - Fired when chart is rendering. * `chartist-render-created` {`CustomEvent`} - Fired once chart is created features are added. * `chartist-render-draw` {`CustomEvent`} - Fired as shapes are being drawn. Attributes: * `chart-title` {`string`} - DEPRECATED: Use heading slot instead for progressive enhancement. * `chart-data` {`any[]`} - Raw data pulled in from the csv file and converted to an array. * `chart-desc` {`string`} - DEPRECATED: Use desc slot instead for progressive enhancement. * `options` - The options available at https://gionkunz.github.io/chartist-js/api-documentation.html. * `pluginAxisTitle` - Optional data for chartist-plugin-axistitle, as in { axisX: { axisTitle: "Time (mins)", offset: { x: 0, y: 50 }, textAnchor: "middle" }, axisY: { axisTitle: "Goals", axisClass: "ct-axis-title", offset: { x: 0, y: -1 }, flipTitle: false } } See https://github.com/alexstanbury/chartist-plugin-axistitle * `pluginPointLabels` - Optional data for chartist-plugin-pointlabels, as in { labelOffset: { x: 0, y: -10 }, textAnchor: 'middle', labelInterpolationFnc: Chartist.noop } See https://github.com/gionkunz/chartist-plugin-pointlabels * `pluginFillDonutItems` {`any[]`} - Optional array of items for chartist-plugin-filldonut, as in items : [{ class : '', id: '', content : 'fillText', position: 'center', offsetY: 0, offsetX: 0 }] See https://github.com/moxx/chartist-plugin-fill-donut * `id` {`string`} - The unique identifier of the chart. * `type` {`string`} - The type of chart:bar, line, or pie * `scale` {`string`} - The scale of the chart. tags.name: citation-element
tags.description:
`citation-element`
An element dedicated to presenting and managing a correct citation on the web
both visually as well as semantically with simple inputs.

Attributes:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title of the work.

  * `display-method` {`string`} - How to present the citation on the interface.
Can be popup, footnote, or default behavior which is visible

  * `creator` {`string`} - Person or group that owns / created the work.

  * `date` {`string`} - Date the work was accessed.

  * `license-name` {`string`} - License name, calculated or supplied by the end user if we don't have them.

  * `license-link` {`string`} - License link for more details

  * `license` {`string`} - License short hand. Options cc0,

  * `scope` {`string`} - License scope

  * `source` {`string`} - Original Source of the work in question

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

Properties:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title of the work.

  * `displayMethod` {`string`} - How to present the citation on the interface.
Can be popup, footnote, or default behavior which is visible

  * `creator` {`string`} - Person or group that owns / created the work.

  * `date` {`string`} - Date the work was accessed.

  * `licenseName` {`string`} - License name, calculated or supplied by the end user if we don't have them.

  * `licenseLink` {`string`} - License link for more details

  * `license` {`string`} - License short hand. Options cc0,

  * `scope` {`string`} - License scope

  * `source` {`string`} - Original Source of the work in question

  * `schemaResourceID` {`string`} - 

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

layer of the backend system that HAX is riding on.

filtering to match what actually is going to be allowed
to be saved in the first place.

`editable-table-editor-rowcol`
A header label and menu for inserting and deleting a row or a column of editable-table interface (editable-table.html).

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} -

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `position-align` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `keep-open-on-click` {`boolean`} - overrides default behavior of closing
menu after an item is clicked

  * `no-open-on-hover` {`boolean`} - disables menu i=opening on hover

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} -

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

tags.name: grid-plate
tags.description:
`grid-plate`
`A grid plate based on a layout that manipulates it.`

Events:

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; attribute: string; relativeToParent: boolean; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - 

  * `disable-responsive-changed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `resize` {`Event`} - 

Attributes:

  * `data-hax-ray` {`string`} - 

  * `__columnWidths` {`string`} - name of selected layout

  * `item-margin` {`number`} - 

  * `item-padding` {`number`} - 

  * `ready` {`boolean`} - 

  * `breakpoint-sm` {`number`} - Custom small breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

  * `breakpoint-md` {`number`} - Custom medium breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

  * `breakpoint-lg` {`number`} - Custom large breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

  * `breakpoint-xl` {`number`} - Custom extra-large breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

  * `columns` {`number`} - number of columns at this layout / responsive size

  * `disable-responsive` {`boolean`} - disables responsive layouts

  * `layout` {`string`} - an object with a layout's column sizes
at the current responsive width

  * `layouts` - Predefined layouts of column sizes and various responsive widths. 
For example:```
{
"1-1-1-1": {                         //the name of the layout
"xs": ["100%","100%","100%","100%] //the responsive width of each column when the grid is extra small
"sm": ["50%","50%","50%","50%"]    //the responsive width of each column when the grid is small
"md": ["50%","50%","50%","50%"]    //the responsive width of each column when the grid is medium
"lg": ["25%","25%","25%","25%"]    //the responsive width of each column when the grid is large
"xl": ["25%","25%","25%","25%"]    //the responsive width of each column when the grid is extra large
},
{...}
}```

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - Responsive size as `xs`, `sm`, `md`, `lg`, or `xl`

Properties:

  * `dataHaxRay` {`string`} - 

  * `__columnWidths` {`string`} - name of selected layout

  * `itemMargin` {`number`} - 

  * `itemPadding` {`number`} - 

  * `ready` {`boolean`} - 

  * `breakpointSm` {`number`} - Custom small breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

  * `breakpointMd` {`number`} - Custom medium breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

  * `breakpointLg` {`number`} - Custom large breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

  * `breakpointXl` {`number`} - Custom extra-large breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

  * `columns` {`number`} - number of columns at this layout / responsive size

  * `disableResponsive` {`boolean`} - disables responsive layouts

  * `layout` {`string`} - an object with a layout's column sizes
at the current responsive width

  * `layouts` - Predefined layouts of column sizes and various responsive widths. 
For example:```
{
"1-1-1-1": {                         //the name of the layout
"xs": ["100%","100%","100%","100%] //the responsive width of each column when the grid is extra small
"sm": ["50%","50%","50%","50%"]    //the responsive width of each column when the grid is small
"md": ["50%","50%","50%","50%"]    //the responsive width of each column when the grid is medium
"lg": ["25%","25%","25%","25%"]    //the responsive width of each column when the grid is large
"xl": ["25%","25%","25%","25%"]    //the responsive width of each column when the grid is extra large
},
{...}
}```

  * `responsiveSize` {`string`} - Responsive size as `xs`, `sm`, `md`, `lg`, or `xl`

tags.name: hax-body
tags.description:
`hax-body`
Manager of the body area that can be modified

### Styling
`<hax-bodys>` provides following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
--hax-ui-headings |   | #d4ff77;
--hax-color-text | default text color | #000
--hax-contextual-action-text-color |  | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-1
--hax-contextual-action-color |  | --simple-colors-default-theme-cyan-7
--hax-contextual-action-hover-color |  | 
--hax-body-target-background-color: --simple-colors-default-theme-cyan-2
--hax-body-possible-target-background-color: --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2

####Outlines
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
--hax-body-editable-outline |   | 1px solid --simple-colors-default-theme-deep-orange
--hax-body-active-outline-hover: 1px solid --hax-contextual-action-color
--hax-body-active-outline: 3px solid  --hax-contextual-action-color

tags.name: hax-app-search
tags.description:
`hax-app-search`
`An element that brokers the visual display of a listing of material from an end point. The goal is to normalize data from some location which is media centric. This expects to get at least enough data in order to form a grid of items which are selectable. It's also generically implemented so that anything can be hooked up as a potential source for input (example: youtube API or custom in-house solution). The goal is to return enough info via fired event so that we can tell hax-body that the user selected a tag, properties, slot combination so that hax-body can turn the selection into a custom element / element injected into the hax-body slot.`

Attributes:

  * `activeApp` - Active app globally bound based on previous selection.

  * `tos` {`any[]`} - Terms of service object

  * `searchSchema` - Search schema for presenting a form of input.

  * `requestEndPoint` {`string`} - 

  * `requestParams` - 

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - Immediatley perform a request.

  * `headers` - Custom headers for data binding from the App feed.

  * `method` {`string`} - Custom method for requesting data (almost always will be GET)

  * `loading` {`boolean`} - loading

  * `requestData` - Media request data updated

  * `media` {`any[]`} - Media object, normalized.

  * `resultMap` - 

Properties:

  * `activeApp` - Active app globally bound based on previous selection.

  * `tos` {`any[]`} - Terms of service object

  * `searchSchema` - Search schema for presenting a form of input.

  * `requestEndPoint` {`string`} - 

  * `requestParams` - 

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - Immediatley perform a request.

  * `headers` - Custom headers for data binding from the App feed.

  * `method` {`string`} - Custom method for requesting data (almost always will be GET)

  * `loading` {`boolean`} - loading

  * `requestData` - Media request data updated

  * `media` {`any[]`} - Media object, normalized.

  * `resultMap` -

`hax-app`
An app registered with HAX. This provides all the information needed for HAX
to understand how to talk to this backend as well as represent it in listings.
It also expresses how to take that data and wire it up to gizmos making it able to
utilize multiple display methods.

tags.name: hax-context-item
tags.description:
`hax-context-item`
A single button in the hax context menu for consistency.

  * `hax-context-item-selected` {`CustomEvent<{ target: this; eventName: string; value: string; }>`} -

Attributes:

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the button.

  * `description` {`string`} - Optional description for this item.

  * `default` {`boolean`} - Is this button concidered a primary interaction

  * `action` {`boolean`} - 

  * `more` {`boolean`} - more implies there's an action after pressing the button
so it'll put a visual indicator as such

  * `input-method` {`string`} - Method of input to display when activated. This is
only used when triggered as part of haxProperties

reusing events more easily

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: hax-picker
tags.description:
`hax-picker`
A picker for selecting an item from a list of apps / hax gizmos which require
a decision to be made. This is used when multiple things match either on upload
in the add operation of the app or in the gizmo selection to render through,
such as having multiple ways of presenting an image.

Events:

  * `hax-insert-content` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `hax-app-picker-selection` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `simple-modal-hide` {`CustomEvent<{}>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `keywords` - 

  * `filters` {`any[]`} - 

  * `filter-on` {`boolean`} - 

  * `_elements` {`any[]`} - raw element set

  * `selectionList` {`any[]`} - Refactored list for selection purposes

  * `activePreview` {`number`} - 

  * `picker-type` {`string`} - Allow multiple uses

Properties:

  * `keywords` - 

  * `filters` {`any[]`} - 

  * `filterOn` {`boolean`} - 

  * `_elements` {`any[]`} - raw element set

  * `selectionList` {`any[]`} - Refactored list for selection purposes

  * `activePreview` {`number`} - 

  * `pickerType` {`string`} - Allow multiple uses

tags.name: hax-text-editor-button
tags.description:
`hax-text-editor-button`
a custom-element button for hax text editor (custom buttons can extend this)

Events:

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `rich-text-editor-prompt-close` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `rich-text-editor-prompt-confirm` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `rich-text-editor-prompt-open` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `wrapselection` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `command` {`CustomEvent<{ command: any; commandVal: any; range: any; button: this; }>`} - 

  * `paste` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `rangechange` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; range: any; }>`} - 

  * `button-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `element` - 

  * `id` {`string`} - is element a custom inline widget element?

  * `__wrap` - contents node inside selected range

  * `__oldValue` - contents node inside selected range

  * `fields` {`any[]`} - fields for prompt popover.

  * `value` - prefilled value of prompt

  * `command` {`string`} - The command used for globalThis.document.execCommand.

  * `command-val` - Optional parameter for the command.

  * `toggled-command` {`string`} - The command used for globalThis.document.execCommand when toggled.

  * `toggled-command-val` - Optional parameter for the command when toggled.

  * `selectedNode` - currently selected node

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `tagsList` {`string`} - tags edited by this button

  * `range` - current text selected range, which is actually a range.

  * `__toolbar` - 

  * `__source` - 

  * `__highlight` - 

  * `__clipboard` - 

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Hide the null option

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `element` - 

  * `tag` {`string`} - 

  * `id` {`string`} - is element a custom inline widget element?

  * `__wrap` - contents node inside selected range

  * `__oldValue` - contents node inside selected range

  * `promptCommand` - determines which command based on values passed from prompt
(can be overriden for custom prompt  commands)

  * `promptCommandVal` - determines commandVal based on values passed from prompt
(can be overriden for custom prompt command values)

  * `setsInnerHTML` {`boolean`} - determines if prompt also sets innerHTML of range
(can be overriden for custom prompts)

  * `targetedNode` - 

  * `editableSelection` {`boolean`} - 

  * `fields` {`any[]`} - fields for prompt popover.

  * `value` - prefilled value of prompt

  * `command` {`string`} - The command used for globalThis.document.execCommand.

  * `commandVal` - Optional parameter for the command.

  * `toggledCommand` {`string`} - The command used for globalThis.document.execCommand when toggled.

  * `toggledCommandVal` - Optional parameter for the command when toggled.

  * `selectedNode` - currently selected node

  * `selectionAncestors` {`any[]`} - array of ancestors of currently selected node

  * `operationCommand` - gets command param for globalThis.document.execCommand

  * `operationCommandVal` - gets value param for globalThis.document.execCommand

  * `tagsArray` {`string[]`} - tagslist as an array

  * `tagsList` {`string`} - tags edited by this button

  * `range` - current text selected range, which is actually a range.

  * `__toolbar` - 

  * `__source` - 

  * `commandIsToggled` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasBreadcrumbs` {`boolean`} - whether or not toolbar breadcrumbs
(override to force a toolbar to always use or not use them)

  * `toggledCommands` {`any[]`} - an array of all the valid commands that are toggled

  * `validCommands` {`string[]`} - gets valid commands list

  * `highlighted` {`boolean`} - determines if range is being preserved by highlight

  * `haxUIElement` {`boolean`} - 

  * `__highlight` - 

  * `__clipboard` - 

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `button` - gets button element

  * `currentLabel` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `currentIcon` {`string`} - current icon based on toggled state

  * `currentTooltip` {`string`} - current label based on toggled state

  * `isToggled` {`boolean`} - whether button is toggled

  * `focusableElement` - 

  * `hasLabel` {`boolean`} - is label specified

  * `hasIcon` {`boolean`} - is icon specified

  * `hasTooltip` {`boolean`} - is tooltip specified

  * `labelVisible` {`boolean`} - is visible label is needed or specified

  * `tooltipVisible` - is tooltip needed or specified

  * `iconTemplate` {`"" | UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for button icon

  * `labelTemplate` {`"" | UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for button label

  * `tooltipTemplate` {`"" | UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for button tooltip

  * `buttonInnerTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for inner part of button (label and icon) in order specified

  * `buttonTemplate` {`UncompiledTemplateResult<1>`} - template for button, based on whether or not the button toggles

  * `iconPosition` {`string`} - 

  * `alignVertical` {`string`} - 

  * `alignHorizontal` {`string`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Hide the null option

  * `showTextLabel` {`boolean`} - 

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcutKeys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `isCurrentItem` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: hax-text-editor
tags.description:
`hax-text-editor`
HAX-specific implementation of rich-text-editor

Events:

  * `focus` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `contenteditable-change` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `contenteditable` {`string`} - Maps to editing attribute

  * `disable-hover` {`boolean`} - don't reveal toolbar on mouseover

  * `rawhtml` {`string`} - raw html

  * `view-source` {`boolean`} - whether editor is view source code mode

  * `__codeEditorValue` {`string`} - code-editor for view source

  * `__needsUpdate` {`boolean`} - has focus

  * `aria-placeholder` {`string`} - Placeholder text for empty editable regions

  * `toolbar-id` {`string`} - id for toolbar

  * `type` {`string`} - type of editor toolbar, i.e.
full - full for full toolbar with breadcrumb,
mini - mini for mini floating toolbar, or
default toolbar if neither.

  * `id` {`string`} - editor's unique id

  * `range` - current range

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - don't reveal toolbar on mouseover

  * `__focused` {`boolean`} - has focus

  * `__hovered` {`boolean`} - is hovered

tags.name: hax-toolbar-menu
tags.description:
`hax-toolbar-menu`
`An icon / button that has support for multiple options via drop down.`

Events:

  * `close` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu is closed

  * `open` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when menu is opened

  * `item-click` {`CustomEvent<Event>`} - 

  * `register-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `deregister-button` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `button-toggled` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `update-button-registry` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `event-name` {`string`} - Name of the event to bubble up as being tapped.
This can be used to tell other elements what was
clicked so it can take action appropriately.

  * `_blockEvent` {`boolean`} - Internal flag to allow blocking the event firing if machine selects tag.

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `position-align` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `keep-open-on-click` {`boolean`} - overrides default behavior of closing
menu after an item is clicked

  * `no-open-on-hover` {`boolean`} - disables menu i=opening on hover

  * `controls` {`string`} - The `id` of the `simple-toolbar` that the toolbar controls.

  * `describedby` {`string`} - Optional to set aria-describedby.

  * `target` - The active selected range, inherited from the toolbar

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `toggles` {`boolean`} - Can this button toggle?

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - for radio-button behavior

  * `shortcut-keys` {`string`} - Optional space-separated list of shortcut keys

  * `is-current-item` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `eventName` {`string`} - Name of the event to bubble up as being tapped.

  * `offset-margin` {`string`} -

  * `element-align` {`string`} - Alignment of the initial edit button

  * `light` {`boolean`} - Light variant for save button

  * `haxUiTheme` {`string`} - 

  * `hide-panel-ops` {`boolean`} - Showing button area at all a well as internal
state managing buttons like cancel and save

  * `globalPreferences` - Global preferences for HAX overall

  * `activeNode` - Global active node so we know if we need to disable contextual settings

  * `activeGizmo` -

  * `tourOpened` {`string`} -

  * `activeValue` - Form values for active node

  * `can-undo` {`boolean`} - If we can currently undo based on stack position

  * `can-redo` {`boolean`} - If we can currently redo based on stack position

  * `tray-detail` {`string`} - id of toggled section in tray

  * `activeTagName` {`string`} - Element name / what to display based on active element

  * `traySizeIcon` {`string`} -

tags.name: hax-body
tags.description:
`hax-body`
Manager of the body area that can be modified

### Styling
`<hax-bodys>` provides following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
--hax-ui-headings |   | #d4ff77;
--hax-color-text | default text color | #000
--hax-contextual-action-text-color |  | --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-1
--hax-contextual-action-color |  | --simple-colors-default-theme-cyan-7
--hax-contextual-action-hover-color |  | 
--hax-body-target-background-color: --simple-colors-default-theme-cyan-2
--hax-body-possible-target-background-color: --simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2

####Outlines
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
--hax-body-editable-outline |   | 1px solid --simple-colors-default-theme-deep-orange
--hax-body-active-outline-hover: 1px solid --hax-contextual-action-color
--hax-body-active-outline: 3px solid  --hax-contextual-action-color
